title: The Hunt for a Vaccine (with Rachael Maskell MP)
itunes:title: The Hunt for a Vaccine (with Rachael Maskell MP)
description:
Rachael Maskell, Labour MP for York Central and shadow minister for the voluntary sector, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing she's speaking to the Charity Commission about concerns that charities will go bankrupt because of coronavirus.

Plus, the U.S. government is giving AstraZeneca $1 billion to develop a coronavirus vaccine. The drugmaker had promised Britain would be first to get it, so is America now at the front of the queue? Our health editor John Lauerman joins to discuss the hunt for a vaccine.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Plus, the U.S. government is giving AstraZeneca $1 billion to develop a coronavirus vaccine. The drugmaker had promised Britain would be first to get it, so is America now at the front of the queue? Our health editor John Lauerman joins to discuss the hunt for a vaccine.
